edge_1: In October 2008, Josh Brolin entered talks to be cast as Jonah Hex under the direction of Neveldine and Taylor.
edge_2: Brolin (actor) hated the experience making the film 'Jonah Hex' and implied that the filming schedule was hectic, stating that they had to reshoot 66 pages in 12 days.
